sec.p: α-Pinene, α-fellandrene, α-terpinene, linalyl acetate, neral, geranial were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Co. (Italy). β-Pinene, p-cimene, γ-terpinene, terpinolene, linalool, α-terpineol were purchased from Fluka. Mircene, ocimene, neryl acetate, octyl acetate, β-caryophyllene and limonene were purchased from Merck KGaA. Anisole was purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Co (Italy) and used as internal standard.
